thread.title: Continuum Receives Overwhelming Support from Top IT Solution Providers, Industry Leaders and MSPs at Sold Out Navigate 2015
thread.title_full: Continuum Receives Overwhelming Support from Top IT Solution Providers, Industry Leaders and MSPs at Sold Out Navigate 2015

author: admin
title: Continuum Receives Overwhelming Support from Top IT Solution Providers, Industry Leaders and MSPs at Sold Out Navigate 2015
text:
The Channel Company 
Main stage keynote addresses are being delivered by Robin Robins , the IT industry's most sought after marketing consultant, sales trainer and author who specializes in highly effective marketing strategies for VARs, MSPs, solution providers and IT consulting firms as well as Verne Harnish , the founder of the world-renowned Entrepreneurs' Organization (EO). 
“This year’s theme is taking your MSP business to the next level (or stratosphere) with advanced sales and marketing skills in order to grow, and we have put a special emphasis on partners’ success stories at Navigate 2015,” said Michael George , CEO at Continuum. “With more than 30 of our high-performing MSP partners scheduled to share ‘how it’s done’ tips with attendees, we expect all MSPs to walk away with actionable tasks to boost their business immediately as well as over the long term. Building on the success of last year’s inaugural event, we are also honored to have both Robin Robins and Verne Harnish as our keynote speakers. Las Vegas is the place for MSPs to be next week, and we can’t wait.” 
Navigate 2015 is a 3-day educational and training event for the industry’s top MSP partners and IT resellers led by top business and channel leaders. The Navigate 2015 Mobile App is available to download at: https://events.crowdcompass.com/navigate . 
Navigate 2015 is sold out. To join the waitlist, visit: http://page.continuum.net/navigate-2015-sold-out-waitlist . 
For more information on the conference, visit: http://www.continuum.net/navigate2015 . For the latest updates, follow #nav15 on Twitter. 
About Continuum Managed IT Services 
Continuum is the technology industry's only channel-exclusive provider of fully integrated managed IT services, allowing its Managed Services Provider (MSP) partners to maintain both on premise and cloud-based servers, desktops, mobile devices and other endpoints for small-and-medium-sized businesses. Continuum’s SaaS platform enables MSPs to efficiently backup, monitor, troubleshoot and maintain clients’ IT infrastructurefrom a single pane of glass, all backed by an industry–leading network operations center (NOC) and Help Desk. The company employs over 1,000 professionals worldwide, supports 3,500 partners servicing 50,000 SMB customers and monitors over 700,000 endpoints. In 2012, Continuum established the Continuum Veterans Foundation, a nonprofit organization providing financial support to charities focused on helping veterans find jobs in IT. For more information, visit http://www.continuum.net/ or follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter @FollowContinuum . All trademarks recognized.
